    Function reference

    All functions

    CorrManhattan()
    Generate predictor-outcome correlations in Manhattan plot
    abcd_anxiety
    Mock ABCD anxiety data
    abcd_colour
    Mock ABCD "colour" data
    abcd_cort_sa
    Mock ABCD cortical surface area data
    abcd_cort_t
    Mock ABCD cortical thickness data
    abcd_depress
    Mock ABCD depression data
    abcd_h_income
    Mock ABCD income data
    abcd_income
    Mock ABCD income data
    abcd_pubertal
    Mock ABCD pubertal status data
    abcd_subc_v
    Mock ABCD subcortical volumes data
    add_columns()
    Add columns to a dataframe
    add_design_matrix_rows()
    deprecated function
    add_settings_matrix_rows()
    Add settings matrix rows
    adjusted_rand_index_heatmap()
    Heatmap meta-clustering results
    age_df
    Mock age data
    alluvial_cluster_plot()
    Alluvial plot of patients across cluster counts and important variables
    arrange_dl()
    Given a data_list object, sort data elements by subjectkey
    assemble_data()
    Collapse a dataframe and/or a data_list into a single dataframe
    assigned_clust_hist()
    Histogram of cluster membership across an solutions matrix
    assigned_clust_pheatmap()
    Heatmap of cluster membership across an solutions matrix
    assigned_clust_scatter()
    Scatter plot of cluster membership across an solutions matrix
    batch_snf()
    Run variations of SNF.
    batch_snf_time_remaining()
    Time remaining until batch_snf completion
    calc_ari()
    Calculate adjusted rand index between two rows of solutions matrix
    calc_om_aris()
    Meta-cluster calculations
    calculate_association_pval()
    Calculate p-values based on variable vectors and their types
    calculate_associations()
    Calculate p-values for pairwise associations of variables in a data_list
    calculate_db_indices()
    Calculate Davies-Bouldin indices
    calculate_dunn_indices()
    Calculate Dunn indices
    calculate_silhouettes()
    Calculate silhouette scores
    cancer_diagnosis_df
    Mock diagnosis data
    cbcl_anova()
    Calculate anova p-values for a characterization_df
    cbcl_bar_chart()
    Bar chart CBCL values for a characterization dataframe
    cbcl_ord_reg()
    Calculate overall p-values for a characterization_df
    cbcl_ord_reg_from_om()
    Calculate overall p-values for an om
    cell_significance_fn()
    Place significance stars on ComplexHeatmap cells.
    char_to_fac()
    Convert character-type columns of a dataframe to factor-type
    check_similarity_matrices()
    Check validity of similarity matrices
    check_subj_orders_for_lp()
    Check subject orders for label propagation
    chi_sq_p()
    Chi-squared test p-value
    chi_squared_pval()
    Chi-squared test p-value (generic)
    clean_plot()
    Clean a plot
    clusterToOutcomeCorr()
    Functions to calculate correlation between cluster assignment to outcome variables and visualize to find meaningful clusters with Manhattan plot
    clusterToOutcomeManhattan()
    Display cluster assignment to outcome correlation as Manhattan plot
    cocluster_heatmap()
    Heatmap of patient co-clustering across resampled data
    collapse_dl()
    Collapse a data_list into a single dataframe
    convert_uids()
    Convert unique identifiers of data_list to 'subjectkey'
    corrHeatmap()
    Generate correlation heatmap
    corrHeatmap_legend()
    Generate correlation heatmap legend
    correlation_pval_heatmap()
    Heatmap of pairwise associations between variables
    diagnosis_df
    Mock diagnosis data
    dl_variable_summary()
    Variable-level summary of a data_list
    domain_merge()
    SNF scheme: Domain merge
    domains()
    Domains
    drop_inputs()
    Execute inclusion
    euclidean_distance()
    Distance metric: Euclidean distance
    execute_design_matrix()
    deprecated function
    execute_design_matrix_p()
    deprecated function
    execute_inclusion()
    deprecated function
    expression_df
    Modification of SNFtool mock dataframe "Data1"

    Extend an solutions matrix to include outcome evaluations
    fisher_exact_pval()
    Fisher exact test p-value
    format_weights_row()
    Prep weights_row for matrix multiplication

    Average fraction of clustering together

    Mock gender data
    generate_annotations_list()
    Generate annotations list

    Calculate patient co-clustering across subsamples
    generate_data_list()
    Generate a data_list
    generate_design_matrix()
    deprecated function
    generate_distance_metrics_list()

    generate_output_matrix()

    Build solutions matrix
    generate_target_list()

    generate_weights_matrix()
    Generate a matrix to store variable weights
    get_cluster_df()
    Extract dataframe of cluster and subject key from solutions matrix row

    Get p-value
    get_cluster_solutions()
    Extract all cluster solutions from a solutions_matrix

    Get clustered subjects
    get_clusters()
    Extract list of assigned clusters

    Calculate distance matrices

    Return the row ordering of a meta-clustering solution
    get_mean_p()
    Get mean p-value
    get_min_p()
    Get minimum p-value
    get_p()
    Get p-value (deprecated)
    get_p_vals_row_df()
    Return the p-values of a single settings_matrix row from a target_pvals df
    gower_distance()
    Distance metric: Gower distance
    hamming_distance()
    Distance metric: Hamming distance
    individual()
    SNF Scheme: Individual
    keep_split()
    Filter data to training or testing subjects only
    label_prop()
    Label propagation
    lin_reg_p()
    Linear regression p-value
    linear_model_pval()
    Linear model p-value (generic)
    list_remove()
    Remove items from a data_list or target_list
    lp_row()
    Label propagation over an solutions matrix
    manhattan_plot()
    Manhattan plot of p-values
    mc_heatmap()
    Outdated adjusted_rand_index_heatmap
    merge_df_list()
    Merge list of dataframes
    meta_cluster()
    Outdated calc_om_aris
    methylation_df
    Modification of SNFtool mock dataframe "Data2"
    no_subs()
    Select all columns of a dataframe not starting with the 'subject_' prefix.
    numcol_to_numeric()
    Convert dataframe columns to numeric type
    om_scatter()
    Scatter plot solutions matrix results by minimum and mean p-values
    ord_reg_p()
    Ordinal regression p-value (deprecated)
    ord_reg_pval()
    Ordinal regression p-value
    p_val_select()
    Select p-values from solutions matrix
    parallel_batch_snf()
    Parallel processing form of batch_snf
    plot_all_cbcl()
    Plot clusters across all CBCL measures
    plot_nmis()
    Scatter plot the NMI values for each row of an nmi_df
    pooled_cocluster_heatmap()
    Plot a co-clustering heatmap across multiple settings_matrix rows
    prefix_dl_sk()
    Add "subject_" prefix to all UID values in subjectkey column
    pvals_heatmap()
    Pheatmap a matrix of p-values
    random_removal()
    Generate random removal sequence
    reduce_dl_to_common()
    Reduce data_list to common subjects
    remove_dl_na()
    Remove NAs from a data_list object
    remove_signal()
    Linearly correct data_list by variables with unwanted signal
    resample()
    Helper resample function found in ?sample
    scale_diagonals()
    Adjust the diagonals of a matrix
    select_om()
    deprecated function
    settings_matrix_heatmap()
    Heatmap settings matrix based on meta-clustering results
    settings_matrix_row_fn()
    Apply-based function for batch_snf
    sew_euclidean_distance()
    Squared (excluding weights) Euclidean distance
    similarity_matrix_heatmap()
    Plot heatmap of similarity matrix
    similarity_matrix_path()
    Generate a complete path and filename to store an similarity matrix
    siw_euclidean_distance()
    Squared (including weights) Euclidean distance
    sn_euclidean_distance()
    Distance metric: Standard normalization then Euclidean
    snf_step()
    SNF a data_list
    sol()
    deprecated function
    spectral_eigen()
    Clustering algorithm: Spectral clustering with eigen-gap heuristic

    Clustering algorithm: Spectral clustering with eigen-gap heuristic

    Clustering algorithm: Spectral clustering for a eight cluster solution

    Clustering algorithm: Spectral clustering for a four cluster solution
    spectral_nine()
    Clustering algorithm: Spectral clustering for a nine cluster solution
    spectral_rot()
    Clustering algorithm: Spectral clustering with rotation cost heuristic
    spectral_rot_classic()
    Clustering algorithm: Spectral clustering with rotation cost heuristic
    spectral_seven()
    Clustering algorithm: Spectral clustering for a seven cluster solution
    spectral_six()
    Clustering algorithm: Spectral clustering for a six cluster solution
    spectral_ten()
    Clustering algorithm: Spectral clustering for a ten cluster solution
    spectral_three()
    Clustering algorithm: Spectral clustering for a three cluster solution
    spectral_two()
    Clustering algorithm: Spectral clustering for a two cluster solution
    subs()
    Select all columns of a dataframe starting with a given string prefix.
    subsample_data_list()
    Create subsamples of a data_list
    subsample_pairwise_aris()
    Calculate pairwise adjusted Rand indices across subsamples of data
    summarize_clust_algs_list()
    Summarize a clust_algs_list object
    summarize_distance_metrics_list()
    Summarize metrics contained in a distance_metrics_list
    summarize_dl()
    Summarize data list
    summarize_target_list()
    Summarize target list
    top_om_per_cluster()
    Select the top solutions matrix rows for each cluster
    train_test_assign()
    Training and testing split
    two_step_merge()
    Two step SNF
